title: Eumig Type P8 Automatic 'Novo' Standard-8 Projector
brief_description:
Eumig P8 M Standard-8 projector

From web:
Eumig P8 Automatic Novo
Standard 8mm
Lens: Eumig Eupro-Zoom 1:1,3 F 15-25
Eupronar1:1,4 F20
Lamp: 12V 100W, FCR
Film loading: Automatic threading
Reel capacity: 120m/400ft
Projection: Forward and backward
Projection speed: Variable Speed by Slider Control (8 - 24 fps)
Motor: DC Magnetic Motor
Power Source: AC. 50 Hz
Weight: 5600g
Dimensions: 130x240x210
